response.original_title: The Best of Beavis and Butt-Head: Work Sucks / The Final Judgement
response.overview: Work Sucks: Who says America's youth has lost its work ethic?  Beavis and Butt-head are always looking for ways to make a buck!  These eight classic Beavis and Butt-head episodes follow the boys through their burger-flipping, insect-frying days at Burger World to their numerous ill-conceived get-rich-quick schemes!  The Final Judgement:  They all want a piece of Beavis and Butt-head.  In these classic episodes, everybody from Highland High to Heaven tries to get even with them.  And whether it's coach Buzzcut trying to make Butt-head laugh, or principal McVicker trying to bust Beavis when he wanders the school halls as The Great Cornholio, this collection is a laugh riot.
response.tagline: Work sucks, but this DVD doesn't!
response.title: The Best of Beavis and Butt-Head: Work Sucks / The Final Judgement
